summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS AN ACTIVEHEAT 6HCSBL24. THE HEATED SEAT COVER WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL ASSOCIATED WITH NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 11E014000 (EQUIPMENT). THE SEAT COVER WAS SENT IN TO THE MANUFACTURER AND THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT HE WOULD RECEIVE A NEW HEATED SEAT COVER WITHIN SIX TO EIGHT WEEKS. THE NEW SEAT COVER WAS NEVER RECEIVED. THE CONTACT ALSO MADE SEVERAL UNSUCCESSFUL ATTEMPTS AT REACHING THE MANUFACTURER.
